definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: She cleverly got rid of the rogues who followed her, and called the police.
sentences.chinese: 甩脱了尾随她的小流氓，然后报了警。

sentences.english: So, who’s the gangster and who’s the cop?
sentences.chinese: 所以究竟谁是流氓，谁是警察？

sentences.english: I want to make a mental the rascal lives on a nice girl.
sentences.chinese: 我要做个思想上的女流氓，生活上的好姑娘。

sentences.english: The thugs gave him a thorough going-over.
Bully local ruffians and hooligans, are pillars of the nation.
sentences.chinese: 混混地痞流氓，都是国家栋梁。

sentences.english: You know how many perverts are out there?
sentences.chinese: 你知道现在外头有多少流氓吗？

sentences.english: To date, but also as a rogue group singing the praises of the local community.
sentences.chinese: 时至今日，还要为本土流氓集团歌功颂德。

sentences.english: The thugs gave him a real going - over .
sentences.chinese: 那帮流氓把他著实打了一顿。

sentences.english: The ragged rascal ran around the rugged rocks round and round.
sentences.chinese: 衣着槛褛的流氓围着崎岖的岩石转了又转。

sentences.english: The hooligan stood leaning against the wall, cigarette between lips and scar on face.
sentences.chinese: 流氓斜倚着墙站着，嘴里叼根烟，脸上一个刀疤。

sentences.english: Are journalists lovable rogues or human-rights crusaders?
sentences.chinese: 他们到底是可爱的流氓还是人权的捍卫者？

sentences.english: Scampish software and postern trojan, privately installs a lot of scampish software for the user.
sentences.chinese: 流氓软件与后门木马，私自为用户安装很多流氓软件。

sentences.english: Scampish software and postern trojan, privately installs a lot of scampish software for the user.
sentences.chinese: 流氓软件与后门木马，私自为用户安装很多流氓软件。

sentences.english: Her mouth had been bloodied by the bully.
sentences.chinese: 她的嘴被流氓打出血了。

sentences.english: Loan sharks often use gangsters to put the screws on people who do not meet their payment deadlines.
sentences.chinese: 高利贷者常常利用流氓对不按期还钱的人们进行威胁。

sentences.english: Turn us into a vicious life in this way, rogue with higher education.
sentences.chinese: 歹毒的生活把我们变成了这样，受过高等教育的流氓。

definition: (Wu dialect) bum/wretched-looking tramp who lives by begging or stealing
lit. dressed up animal (idiom)/fig. immoral and despicable person
